title: "disconnected" 3x but still have continuous internet
body:
in the middle of ranked i got kicked out of the match and sent back to the client to reconnect 3x.

immediately went to imgur to check because if imgurs up and running you know you have internet.

im alt tabbed and browsing the internet while league on the other hand is showing "reconnecting" bar

replies.body: It sounds like your own internet is working fine if imgur is loading alright. There must be something that is blocking your connection to our game servers specifically. Take a look over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can try to get to the main reason why your network can't reach our servers.

riot cant help you. its strictly packet loss from your ISP. 

your rig is fine, riot isnt out to get you. but you get bottle necked by tons of requests at once during busy hours because you dont have the speed you were advertised. they have a shared amount to give to people in X region.
